name: Promotion Class - Brigand
description:
Role: Melee Damage

A stealthy lurker of the shadows focused solely on melee weapons and eliminating their victims with lethal traps.

Grants the powers:
Concussive Trap

Grants a permanent Energy Regeneration Rate of 2(s) in all Power Trays.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Brigand promotion class and prevents access to the Warden and Archer promotion classes.
